definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wander, stray (NH id., err; Aram. [[טְעָא]], t.9o0; Ar. t.aga exceed just limit, be immoderate, extravagant, t.agiyah;un one who deviates from right way: Eth. t’a9ot: apostasy, superstition, idolatry)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. f. [[טׂעֲיׇה]]([[כְּ]]) Ct So 1:7 like a wandering (vagrant) woman, for MT [[כְּעׂטְיָה]] acc. to SyrVer Sym. Targum Vulgate Bö Hi Gr al.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִטְעוּ אֶת־עַמִּי]] Ez Eze 13:10 fig., they have led astray my people.
